title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Jun 12th thru Jun
description:
Here we are again! I know, I am getting later every time! Anyway, I just wanted to upload this torrent before I forgot. Well, here are eleven more broadcasts of the #1 late night radio program in the history of radio! Thanks in advance to those loyal fans out there who continue to spread these torrents to other sites. Spread the knowledge my friends. I will see you all next week, hopefully..... Stokeman Out....

Thursday June 12th, 2008
The William Shatner Interview
During the first two hours, actor William Shatner shared stories from his remarkable career including his roles in Twilight Zone, Star Trek, and Boston Legal. He got his start doing radio plays in his native Canada, before moving on to acting for the... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): William Shatner, Seth Shostak, Laurance Doyle

Friday June 13th, 2008
&#039;Friday the 13th&#039; Open Lines
During Open Lines, George offered a special &#039;Friday the 13th&#039; line. A caller from Beaumont, TX who was born on Friday the 13th said as a child he became convinced he was doomed because of society&#039;s negative view of &#039;13.&#039; He thought his fate was certain... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Pat Boone, Christian Wilde, Anne Serling, Marc Zicree, Richard C. Hoagland, Open Lines

Saturday June 14th, 2008
Chinese Impact on Western Culture
Retired British Royal Navy submarine commander and author Gavin Menzies discussed his work chronicling the Chinese discovery of the Americas, and how their technology sparked change in Europe in the 15th century. Menzies argues that the Chinese...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Gavin Menzies

Sunday June 15th, 2008
Replay: Christopher Moon 10/20/07
A replay from 10/20/07 was featured with paranormal investigator Christopher Moon talking about his work with &#039;Frank&#039;s Box.&#039; The first hour guest was Charles Ostman. Note: George Knapp will return next Sunday for his originally scheduled interview... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Christopher Moon, Charles Ostman

Monday June 16th, 2008
Chemtrails, Cell Phones & Air Ships
Author and investigative reporter Will Thomas presented his latest research on chemtrails and cell phone risks, as well as discussed his interest in an emerging air ship technology. A new lab analysis of chemtrail samples (from aerial spraying) done...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): William Thomas, Glynis McCants

Tuesday June 17th, 2008
Nessie & Bigfoot
Writer and producer Lee Frank discussed his expeditions in search of the Loch Ness monster (Nessie), as well as his investigations into the Bigfoot mystery. Sightings of Nessie date back to 565 AD when a Celtic monk reported seeing the creature. Though... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Lee Frank, Joyce Riley

Wednesday June 18th, 2008
The Hubble Telescope
Appearing during the first three hours, author Robert Zimmerman talked about his new book The Universe in a Mirror, which covers the history and discoveries of the Hubble Telescope. Astrophysicist Lyman Spitzer proposed the concept of a telescope in... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Robert Zimmerman

Thursday June 19th, 2008
Prophecy & the Coming Deception
Researcher L.A.Marzulli discussed how a recent string of events validates notions of a coming great deception, as foretold in ancient prophecies. He cited the Myanmar cyclone, the Chinese earthquake, and other natural disasters, along with the Middle... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): L. A. Marzulli, Dr. Claude Swanson

Friday June 20th, 2008
&#039;Hope&#039; Line
During Open Lines, George offered a special &#039;Hope&#039; hotline in honor of Coast producer Tom Danheiser&#039;s uncle, who passed away recently. Anthony in Illinois recounted the unusual circumstances surrounding the time his mom was diagnosed with a large brain... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Wayne Dyer

Saturday June 21st, 2008
Population Control
During the first half of the program, Ian was joined by author Matthew Connelly, who shared his research into the history of world population control and the underlying misconception that all of the world&#039;s big problems (poverty, war, pollution, etc.)... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Matthew Connelly, Donna Dickenson

Sunday June 22nd, 2008
Flying Saucers and Science
George Knapp (email) welcomed Ufologist Stanton Friedman for the full four hours, as he discussed his forty years of research on UFOs. "I&#039;ve never seen a flying saucer ... I&#039;ve never seen an alien. My approach is based on collecting, reviewing, and... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Stanton Friedman
